p: Predominantly black (37%) or Hispanic/Latinx (34%) and â‰¥45 years of age (53%) PWH mostly reside in urban areas of Texas [ 49]. More than half (61%) have acquired HIV through male-male sexual contact, whereas heterosexual contact (23%), injection drug use (9%), and male-male sexual contact/injection drug use (6%) comprise other frequent transmission modes. Jurisdictions with the highest HIV burden are Harris and Dallas, followed by Bexar, Tarrant, and Travis counties [ 49].
